effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder is hit by a contact move, the attacking Pokémon takes 1/6 its max HP in damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: When the holder is hit by a contact move, the attacking Pokémon takes 1/6 its max HP in damage.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.
